content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTCollect') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTCollect
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTCollect (
	[lms_collect_id] int,
	[lms_collect_date] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_cservice] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_billcust] int,
	[lms_collect_pickupcustid] int,
	[lms_collect_delivercustid] int,
	[lms_collect_locationid] int,
	[lms_collect_noofparcels] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_weight] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_timeready] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_vehiclecapacity] int,
	[lms_collect_collectrefno] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_timeclosed] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_securitycollect] int,
	[lms_collect_confirmedby] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_courierid] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_confirmeddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_transferreddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_senddate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_orderid] int,
	[lms_collect_orderdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_userid] int,
	[lms_collect_reason] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_cubes] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_collect_custref] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_custref3] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_custaccid] int,
	[lms_collect_collectparentid] int,
	[lms_collect_duedate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_specdel] int,
	[lms_collect_flunits] int,
	[lms_collect_flkgs] int,
	[lms_collect_quote] numeric(18,2),
	[lms_collect_bill_vehicletype] int,
	[lms_collect_collectstatusid] int,
	[lms_collect_bill_collectstatusid] int,
	[lms_collect_cancelreason] int,
	[lms_collect_cancelcomments] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_loadid] int,
	[lms_collect_custref2] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_created] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_oncollection] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_collected] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_complete] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_cancelled] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_failed] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_ctype] int,
	[lms_collect_quoteid] int,
	[lms_collect_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_notes] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_docurl] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_docdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_collect_orvstatus] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collect_orvcode] int,
	[lms_collect_oldloadid] int,
	[lms_bcustomer_id] int,
	[lms_bcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_pcustomer_id] int,
	[lms_pcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_dcustomer_id] int,
	[lms_dcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_users_id] int,
	[lms_users_fullname] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_clocation_id] int,
	[lms_clocation_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_collectstatus_id] int,
	[lms_collectstatus_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_draftcollection_id] bigint,
	[orv_draftcollection_fromlocid] int,
	[orv_draftcollection_loadid] int,
	[orv_draftcollection_status] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_draftcollection_importedate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_draftcollection_fromstr] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_draftcollection_did] bigint,
	[orv_draftcollection_mergedlmsid] int,
	[orv_draftcollection_rejectdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_draftcollection_confirmdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_draftcollection_customerref] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_draftcollection_collectionwaybillid] bigint,
	[orv_draftcollection_collectbydate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_draftcollection_rejectreason] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_draftcollection_cancelctr] int,
	[orv_delivery_id] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_dispatchid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_waybillid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_address] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_town] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_province] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_country] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_lat] float,
	[orv_delivery_lng] float,
	[orv_delivery_placeid] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_what3words] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_zipcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_eta] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_actualeta] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_deliverydate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_deliverby] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_deliveryorder] int,
	[orv_delivery_tsgeofenceenter] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_tsscanningstart] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_tsscanningstop] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_tspodsignature] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_aid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_numprcls] int,
	[orv_delivery_geocodingstatus] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_skipdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_skipreason] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_status] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_partialmatch] int,
	[orv_delivery_approximated] int,
	[orv_delivery_lmsorder] int,
	[orv_delivery_optimizedorder] int,
	[orv_delivery_seal] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_customerinvoice] int,
	[orv_delivery_customerdn] int,
	[orv_delivery_grv] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_chepslip] int,
	[orv_delivery_cleandelivery] int,
	[orv_delivery_trackingcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_mode] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_customorder] int,
	[orv_delivery_verified] int,
	[orv_delivery_altered] int,
	[orv_delivery_orderid] int,
	[orv_delivery_mergeid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_orderref] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_drivernote] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_guid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_timedefinite] int,
	[orv_delivery_orvcode] int,
	[orv_delivery_vaid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_delegatedate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_delegatemode] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_debriefmode] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_debriefed] int,
	[orv_delivery_insdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_reviseddebrief] int,
	[orv_delivery_lmsdebriefed] int,
	[orv_delivery_uncanceldate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_podlaterdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_podmanualdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_manualdebriefreason] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_submanualdebriefreason] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_outofgeofencereason] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_tsentergeofenceapp] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_tsexitgeofenceapp] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_comebacklater] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_uncancelusername] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_cref] int,
	[orv_delivery_division] int,
	[orv_delivery_descriptionofgoods] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_skiplng] float,
	[orv_delivery_skiplat] float,
	[orv_delivery_courierid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_posreason] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_delivery_moddate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_delivery_mallid] int,
	[orv_delivery_mallgid] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_lmsidskipreason] bigint,
	[orv_delivery_deleteforimport] int,
	[orv_delivery_podoutofgeofence] int,
	[orv_delivery_originalcustomerid] bigint,
	[orv_originalcustomer_id] bigint,
	[orv_originalcustomer_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_id] bigint,
	[orv_mall_mallname] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_branchname] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_gpretailer] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_highvoldelivery] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_stripmall] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_standalonestore] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_streetsidestore] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_dedicatedrouted] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_insdate] datetime2(7),
	[orv_mall_address] nvarchar(4000),
	[orv_mall_deleted] int,
	[orv_mall_lat] float,
	[orv_mall_lng] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstcollect.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.F_SSTCollect
GO
